name: Real Studio Menu File
summary: Learn about .RBM files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: Before it was replaced, you could create a RBM file by clicking the tab of the menu bar you wanted to export, selecting File → Export [menu bar name]..., choosing the save location, naming the file, and clicking Save.
To import the RBM file, select File → Import, navigate to your file location, and click Import.
NOTE: REAL Software Real Studio became Xojo, Inc. Xojo in 2013.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
